data.what_is:
ActiveDEMAND is a flexible marketing automation platform for digital marketing agencies, senior living providers, and marketers. ActiveDEMAND packages range from the full-featured call tracking application, a Reporter package for great analytics, a well-rounded offering for small business marketers, all the way up to powerful Marketing solutions designed for digital marketing agencies with multi-client management needs.

Engage and track prospects using the integrated, comprehensive call tracking module, do more with built-in email templates, landing pages and social media. Convert leads and prospects into customers using automated marketing to manage nurture campaigns, auto-replies and more. Retain customers and grow your repeat businesses with powerful newsletters, special promotions and more.
data.product_description: The ActiveDEMAND integrated marketing platform is scalable and powerful. The call tracking does more than simply track calls, the small business marketer package has everything you need: email, landing pages, social and full dynamic content and the Marketing Agency Portal is designed specifically for multi-client account management.ActiveDEMAND is an integrated marketing automation platform designed for digital marketing agencies although end user B2B and B2C companies also see value. ActiveDEMAND is feature rich when it comes to marketing automation and includes everything you need in a platform. Where ActiveDEMAND is different is the way the platform aids digital marketing agencies in managing and delivering value to their clients.ActiveDEMAND's dashboard reporting and real-time alerts not only saves agencies significant time when reporting results to clients but the reporting is more accurate, complete and meaningful. With attribution reporting clients can see exactly what is impacting their sales and bottom line.AcitveDEMAND is the only integrated marketing automation platform to natively include a comprehensive call tracking module. ActiveDEMAND does more than just track calls, it includes conversation tracking, CallForensics, IVR, softphone, VOIP and lots more.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 17 ActiveDEMAND reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 13 ActiveDEMAND reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 22 ActiveDEMAND reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 22 ActiveDEMAND reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 21 ActiveDEMAND reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 21 ActiveDEMAND reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

initial_reviews.review_title: Go for one of the well known brands...
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
My experience was extremely challenging and I used the product for a year.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
- extremely basic UX
- fundamental issues with reporting dashboards - cannot receive email versions of these
- inaccurate reporting
- contacts dropping out of campaigns or getting stuck in certain stages with no reason why
- CRM prospects being pushed in as Admin's on the ActiveDemand account (!?!?)
- Cannot setup a lead as such in Pipedrive without creating a deal first - this is absolutely basic functionality
- contact lists sometimes blanking out certain details of the contact - for no apparent reason, and cannot be seen when exported either
- basic "unsubscribes" in Active Demand do not always come through into Pipedrive so have to manually check this for every single unsubscribe contact
- when importing contacts it would duplicate the list upload so you end up with 15 blank lists and have to guess which one held the contacts
- customer support never knew what the issues were/why they were happening - system is super buggy in general
- the forms would often not appear on the website, and/or only work on some browers/OS - but you won't know so will never know what leads you missed out on.

- I have so many more issues, but hopefully this gives you a flavour....

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
It was supposed to be Marketing Automation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Flexible follow up automation with text message integration
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
Integrating text messages and emails was a must-have for any follow-up automation system our team was looking at. While other service providers theoretically offered text messages, they needed to be integrated and delivered through Twillio. If you're ok with that then this review isn't relevant. But if you also find Twillio complicated and confusing, then Active Demand is a great solution. It was dead simple to build automations and incorporate a mix of emails, text messages, and call reminders within our CRM (Pipedrive). From my research, no other service offered all of these aspects of a follow-up campaign.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
While the automation builder in Active Demand is robust, it's not as sleek as its competitors. The Active Campaign automation builder was a lot easier to use and test, however, with it lacking the easy-to-use texting, we had to look elsewhere. I'm hoping Active Demand will continue upgrading its services and only improve from here.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem Active Demand is solving is allowing our team to automatically follow up with all of our leads. From new leads that are just entering our sales funnel to leads our team has been working on for a while, Active Demand helps ensure no leads are falling through the cracks. The benefits we've realized from it are more sales from leads that our team had previously thought they had lost. This also allows our lead intake team to save time on follow up, and focus their time on hot leads, rather than chasing cold leads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Active Demand for the Marketing Win.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
Once you are in the Agency program adding new clients is very straightforward, this allows all energies to go into getting a clients marketing both setup and traceable in very short order.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
Additional metrics and custom report building was required for some B2B results to be effectively displayed. The A/D team was very helpful in this regard and we now have amazing B2B tracking on "a''" our marketing activites.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
All marketing automation systems have a steep learning curve, understand that, be ready and yes it's well worth the effort.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
As outlined above, we wanted to track results at the granular level, then roll them up from real-time reporting to week/week, month/month and rolling 12-month reporting. This has allowed us to focus on year-over-year results, and as the data is so granular we can actually see what is working and why, as well as what is not working and why. This ability to both see and leverage real time data has resulted in amazing B2B lead generation gains.

Now we will no longer set up a new client without Active Demand.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Active Demand's support staff is outstanding. There hasnt' been a single question or problem they haven't helped us solve. Active Demand allows us to gain valuable insights into our users behaviors without breaking our bank. You get a ton of bang for your buck.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
As an all-encompassing product, the learning curve can be steep. But if you take the time to learn it thoroughly, you can use it to meet all your marketing needs.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
Active Demand is allowing us to give comparable marketing insight to all 11 of our companies without breaking the budget for our smaller acquisitions.

Take the time to review all the videos and read the support articles. Schedule as many training sessions as you're allowed to and ask questions!

initial_reviews.review_title: ActiveDEMAND is like having my very own marketing department
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
ActiveDEMAND templates are awesome. I like that I can configure different base brands and then apply the brand to my email campaigns, landing pages, autoresponders, etc. The branding helps keep things consistent and looking great. The call tracking feature is also very good. I am able to get more insight into what marketing campaigns are generating phone calls versus those that are not. The reporting is very robust so I can see how my efforts are impacting the bottom line.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
Not enough campaign templates. I really like the webinar template where everything is built out for me. Email campaigns, registration pages, surveys, etc. I can set-up a webinar in a matter of minutes and get promoting it. I wish there or more of these type of templates to choose from. I have asked and am told more are coming.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
ActiveDEMAND is extremely affordable compared to other solutions. If you have it in the budget, I recommend purchasing their JumpSTART package which is customized training. While the platform is pretty intuitive, the JumpSTART option gets you going fast and shows you some of the added cool and more advanced features.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
I primarily use ActiveDEMAND as a lead generation tool. The business problem ActiveDEMAND is solving is helping to identify sales-ready leads. Through promotion and the built-in lead scoring system, our sales teams receive notifications from ActiveDEMAND when there is a lead that we deem is qualified. ActiveDEMAND makes sales more efficient which means more business gets closed.

all_reviews.review_title: Go for one of the well known brands...
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
My experience was extremely challenging and I used the product for a year.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
- extremely basic UX
- fundamental issues with reporting dashboards - cannot receive email versions of these
- inaccurate reporting
- contacts dropping out of campaigns or getting stuck in certain stages with no reason why
- CRM prospects being pushed in as Admin's on the ActiveDemand account (!?!?)
- Cannot setup a lead as such in Pipedrive without creating a deal first - this is absolutely basic functionality
- contact lists sometimes blanking out certain details of the contact - for no apparent reason, and cannot be seen when exported either
- basic "unsubscribes" in Active Demand do not always come through into Pipedrive so have to manually check this for every single unsubscribe contact
- when importing contacts it would duplicate the list upload so you end up with 15 blank lists and have to guess which one held the contacts
- customer support never knew what the issues were/why they were happening - system is super buggy in general
- the forms would often not appear on the website, and/or only work on some browers/OS - but you won't know so will never know what leads you missed out on.

- I have so many more issues, but hopefully this gives you a flavour....

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
It was supposed to be Marketing Automation.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
review_question_answers.answer: My experience was extremely challenging and I used the product for a year.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
review_question_answers.answer:
- extremely basic UX
- fundamental issues with reporting dashboards - cannot receive email versions of these
- inaccurate reporting
- contacts dropping out of campaigns or getting stuck in certain stages with no reason why
- CRM prospects being pushed in as Admin's on the ActiveDemand account (!?!?)
- Cannot setup a lead as such in Pipedrive without creating a deal first - this is absolutely basic functionality
- contact lists sometimes blanking out certain details of the contact - for no apparent reason, and cannot be seen when exported either
- basic "unsubscribes" in Active Demand do not always come through into Pipedrive so have to manually check this for every single unsubscribe contact
- when importing contacts it would duplicate the list upload so you end up with 15 blank lists and have to guess which one held the contacts
- customer support never knew what the issues were/why they were happening - system is super buggy in general
- the forms would often not appear on the website, and/or only work on some browers/OS - but you won't know so will never know what leads you missed out on.

- I have so many more issues, but hopefully this gives you a flavour....

review_question_answers.answer: It was supposed to be Marketing Automation.

all_reviews.review_title: Flexible follow up automation with text message integration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
Integrating text messages and emails was a must-have for any follow-up automation system our team was looking at. While other service providers theoretically offered text messages, they needed to be integrated and delivered through Twillio. If you're ok with that then this review isn't relevant. But if you also find Twillio complicated and confusing, then Active Demand is a great solution. It was dead simple to build automations and incorporate a mix of emails, text messages, and call reminders within our CRM (Pipedrive). From my research, no other service offered all of these aspects of a follow-up campaign.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
While the automation builder in Active Demand is robust, it's not as sleek as its competitors. The Active Campaign automation builder was a lot easier to use and test, however, with it lacking the easy-to-use texting, we had to look elsewhere. I'm hoping Active Demand will continue upgrading its services and only improve from here.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem Active Demand is solving is allowing our team to automatically follow up with all of our leads. From new leads that are just entering our sales funnel to leads our team has been working on for a while, Active Demand helps ensure no leads are falling through the cracks. The benefits we've realized from it are more sales from leads that our team had previously thought they had lost. This also allows our lead intake team to save time on follow up, and focus their time on hot leads, rather than chasing cold leads.

all_reviews.review_title: Active Demand for the Marketing Win.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
Once you are in the Agency program adding new clients is very straightforward, this allows all energies to go into getting a clients marketing both setup and traceable in very short order.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
Additional metrics and custom report building was required for some B2B results to be effectively displayed. The A/D team was very helpful in this regard and we now have amazing B2B tracking on "a''" our marketing activites.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
All marketing automation systems have a steep learning curve, understand that, be ready and yes it's well worth the effort.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
As outlined above, we wanted to track results at the granular level, then roll them up from real-time reporting to week/week, month/month and rolling 12-month reporting. This has allowed us to focus on year-over-year results, and as the data is so granular we can actually see what is working and why, as well as what is not working and why. This ability to both see and leverage real time data has resulted in amazing B2B lead generation gains.

Now we will no longer set up a new client without Active Demand.

all_reviews.review_title: ActiveDEMAND is like having my very own marketing department
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
ActiveDEMAND templates are awesome. I like that I can configure different base brands and then apply the brand to my email campaigns, landing pages, autoresponders, etc. The branding helps keep things consistent and looking great. The call tracking feature is also very good. I am able to get more insight into what marketing campaigns are generating phone calls versus those that are not. The reporting is very robust so I can see how my efforts are impacting the bottom line.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
Not enough campaign templates. I really like the webinar template where everything is built out for me. Email campaigns, registration pages, surveys, etc. I can set-up a webinar in a matter of minutes and get promoting it. I wish there or more of these type of templates to choose from. I have asked and am told more are coming.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
ActiveDEMAND is extremely affordable compared to other solutions. If you have it in the budget, I recommend purchasing their JumpSTART package which is customized training. While the platform is pretty intuitive, the JumpSTART option gets you going fast and shows you some of the added cool and more advanced features.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
I primarily use ActiveDEMAND as a lead generation tool. The business problem ActiveDEMAND is solving is helping to identify sales-ready leads. Through promotion and the built-in lead scoring system, our sales teams receive notifications from ActiveDEMAND when there is a lead that we deem is qualified. ActiveDEMAND makes sales more efficient which means more business gets closed.

all_reviews.review_title: ActiveDEMAND has made our marketing much easier.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
It is a great tool for online marketing. Specifically, the call tracking capabilities are outstanding. We needed a solution that not only tracked and routed calls, we needed a solution that would help us drive our marketing initiatives. The Email marketing, landing pages, website visitor tracking, and social posting capabilities are added bonuses for us. ActiveDEMAND has all of the marketing tools in one package. Outstanding!

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
ActiveDEMAND offers a lot of capabilities, which can be a bit overwhelming at first. Initially there were not a lot of tutorials and online help. This has obviously changed since we adopted the product though.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
The client reporting has helped our businesses. If you are looking for a marketing attribution solution, ActiveDEMAND's reporting is outstanding. It has turned leads into customers. This is the second year we are using ActiveDEMAND, as this is a great integrated marketing platform for our company.  If you are a company that works in an agency capacity like we do, the agency branding capabilities are second to none. ActiveDEMAND has shown us that it is possible to market for others, while marketing our company to our clients. If this is your challenge, ActiveDEMAND is the right solution.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are marketing for fifteen businesses from one website, which is a complicated task. The problem we had to solve was: How do we promote 15 businesses, route leads and calls to each of the 15 businesses, all from one platform and one website? ActiveDEMAND was the only solution that made this easy and effective.

all_reviews.review_title: The most complete analytics, lead tracking, landing/email/automation platform I've come across...
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
Customer support.  They're quick to get back to you on support tickets if not immediately available.  The biggest upside to the platform is the cost/benefit of having everything (in my case call tracking, email, landing pages w/ automation/drip campaign and A/B testing) under one roof... and the analytics map/dashboard is awesome.  As an agency, we have our clients set up under our master account with ActiveDemand too.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
The learning curve isn't difficult, but there are a lot of different features and functions and takes a little bit of time to get a grasp on everything.  If you're looking for a basic setup of landing page, email intake, and automation it's easy to use.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
Go through the training videos for everything you're interested in implementing... they're short.  Then, learn about the rest of the platform.  They set training calls if you want, too.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
As an agency, it's sometimes hard to show value or get credit for leads you bring a client.  ActiveDemand has solved this by branding our name to each lead a client gets through an automatic email to the client.  I no longer ask how things are going... instead I ask how the phone call or email they got on a specific date and time turned out knowing, for example, they spoke to the lead for 45 minutes.

Better marketing performance attribution, automated email workflows, better social media attribution and planning.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
I like the idea of a database management program that allows an intelligently devised process from receiving a contact to following up with useful and relevant emails and communications. Having this taken care of is something ahead of other platforms like Gravity Forms.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
The back-end management is far from intuitive, there are so many "characteristics" of the product that you have to understand and master before you can do something that you thought would be intuitive. Setting up a chain of events and communication should be simple, but you find that you have to tweak and hack to make it work... And when it doesn't work, I have just been told that I am unaware of what I should be doing. Therefore, not intuitive, and eats my time up a lot when I could be doing some other method.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
You will need to have a dedicated member of staff that is willing to work hand-in-hand with the rep from ActiveDemand to make sure that it works with what you want it to do... Or else you will have the product dictate what you should do, instead of have it support your existing infrastructure.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
Hands-free marketing campaigns. I've realized that if it was to work, it's useful and effective. It just takes a while to make work.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
ActiveDEMAND delivers fresh leads to my inbox daily. Starting every day with information of people that have actually looked at our site gives me a great starting place to do research from the information provided by Active DEMAND. Most often when I convert those from prospects to clients, the sales cycle is greatly reduced because the client is already warm when I contact them. The data also lets me know if we need to increase our marketing efforts/dollars to drive additional traffic to our site or focus our efforts on another market segment.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
Unfortunately quite a few people looking to sell use something stop by our site. Usually I can filter those out by the contact data ActiveDEMAND provides but now and again, I get stuck on the phone with a person trying to sell me something when I thought I was contacting them to learn what needs we might meet for them.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
Expanding on my previous response, we are solving our companies 'identity crisis by learning how many and what types of people/companies visit our site. The analytical data and tools ActiveDEMAND provides allows me to better determine how and where to market which helps maximize our ROI on the efforts for marketing activity and dollars spent.

All the Google analytics already built in. Fairly easy user interface. Does perform great on Google. Support always provides good response with good turnaround time.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
Website builder will always produce satisfactory websites. They are functional, but certainly you need a lot of work with a Website Designer to make a stunning website using the tools that are provided. I wish that the online tutorials and help sections on the website are up to date and more detailed.

ActiveDEMAND is great for Canadian Customers. But there are others that maybe slightly better, but more pricey.
The fact that Website creation cannot compare to a custom designed website "look" is not available, might turn you off. I can't even have a Website Designer with good experience design me a nice looking page.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
Template development and brand management - ActiveDEMAND makes it simple to maintain your brand identity and a consistent look and feel across campaigns using templates and brand identities that are easy to set up and easy to incorporate into every piece of collateral you develop.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
One element of reporting that I would like to see addedd would be an event registrant report showing all registered people (this part exists) and their responses on the registration form they completed to register for the event. (These things would be dietary restrictions, industry, customized responses to other event related questions).

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
I think no matter what you are hoping to get out of a marketing automation platform, you can achieve it with ActiveDEMAND. It can be used for simple/basic marketing email sending and campaign execution or it can be used to develop a microste, create sales and marketing kiosks, run multi-step campaigns, host protected assets or whatever you want to do with it. You can easily choose (or ignore) the modules and features to be as creative  as you choose to be.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
ActiveDEMAND is currently being used by our Canadian Marketing Team to drive subscription-based marketing initiatives, campaigns and to execute local events. ActiveDEMAND provides us with a single robust tool to help us execute email marketing activities, build landing pages, protect assets, run nurture campaigns, send surveys and more all with powerful analytics and reporting capabilities. The benefits we have realized include:
Simplified email marketing and event management
Better tracking of leads
Better intelligence about which initiatives are working well and where future opportunities lie
Less reliant on IT department/third party to execute our online marketing

all_reviews.review_title: A great marketing platform with exceptional customer service!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ActiveDEMAND?
We are still in the process of implementing full use of ActiveDemand with our clients. However, being able to pull all analytics data into a single report provides an easy way to see all of the information in a single location has been great for us. It will be even better with providing this information to our clients. From an agency perspective, ActiveDemand is also a very powerful product with branding to help with top of mind awareness through the custom form submissions and phone call lead emails.

What do you dislike about ActiveDEMAND?
There isn't really much to dislike, new features are being added all of the time. Perhaps the only issue might be that some of the functionality our business needs wasn't there to begin with, but the ActiveDemand team has been great at taking some of our requests and implementing them.

Recommendations to others considering ActiveDEMAND:
This company provides great customer support. If there are reasons holding you back, discuss them with the team and they may already be in the process of implementing some of them.

What problems is ActiveDEMAND solving and how is that benefiting you?
We haven't been using the product long, but I believe this will provide a long-term solution for us to help our clients better understand the results that we are providing their businesses from the services we offer. It will also help for top of mind awareness when our clients receive a lead from their website to know which marketing channel it came from, as well as more accurately calculate ROIs per marketing channel to see which are most cost effective.
